name: 2012 AS Core: IPv4 vs IPv6 comparison
description: 22,295,909 IP addresses, 18,968,662 IP links, 192 million destinations, 87% of globally routable network prefixes, 30,799 Autonomous Systems (ASes), 95,242 peering sessions. Data collected from 51 monitors located in 25 countries on 6 continents. 24,725 IPv6 addresses, 60,860 IPv6 links, 1.4 million destinations, 92% of globally routeable network prefixes, 1,923 Autonomous Systems (ASes), 7,605 peering sessions. Data collected from 23 Ark monitors located in 14 countries on 6 continents.
